ru.yandex.subtitles.service.speechkit.speaker

Class VocalizerSpeaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.yandex.subtitles.service.speechkit.speaker.AbstractSpeaker
      • ru.yandex.subtitles.service.speechkit.speaker.VocalizerSpeaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.media.AudioManager.OnAudioFocusChangeListener, android.media.SoundPool.OnLoadCompleteListener, ru.yandex.speechkit.VocalizerListener, Speaker

    public class VocalizerSpeaker
extends AbstractSpeaker
implements ru.yandex.speechkit.VocalizerListener
    Class that handles text-to-speech action by using Vocalizer.
